content:
Job Title: Blompener

Location: Anywhere with tall trees and a community to participate

Job Type: Part-time, Freelance

We are looking for individuals with a passion for adventure and a love for art to join our team as Blompeners! As a Blompener, you will be responsible for climbing tall trees and drawing pictures of the surrounding areas from your elevated vantage point.

Responsibilities:

* Locate and identify tall trees in a community that offer a good view of the surroundings.
* Climb the tree safely using appropriate safety equipment.
* Draw detailed and accurate pictures of the surrounding areas, including buildings, streets, parks, and other landmarks.
* Work with other Blompeners to create a collage of drawings on an interactive map.
* Participate in community events and competitions, showcasing your artwork and representing the Blompening community.

Requirements:

* Must be physically fit and able to climb trees safely and confidently.
* Must have a passion for art and a keen eye for detail.
* Strong communication and teamwork skills.
* Willingness to work flexible hours, including weekends and evenings.
* Own safety equipment and art supplies.
* A portfolio of previous drawings is preferred, but not required.

If you have a love for adventure and art, and want to be part of a fun and creative community, then we want to hear from you! Apply now to join the Blompening team!
